Shaw was especially excited though. “I’m just looking forward to some really good sex with a hot guy!” He’s heard a lot about Brandon before they met so he was really eager to get a piece of that…and he wasn’t disappointed! It is what it is, I get it!” I think it’s safe to say that Shaw was completely satisfied.
title: Brandon & Shaw: Bareback
